metadata.title: CVE-2014-8601 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
PowerDNS Recursor before 3.6.2 does not limit delegation chaining, whichallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service ("performancedegradations") via a large or infinite number of referrals, as demonstratedby resolving domains hosted by ezdns.it.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8601` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 3.6.2-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2-2').
